about_the_game:
The official soundtrack of Insect Adventure, composed by "Paradoxigent" and guest composer Joy Elvidge-Reeks. Immerse your human ears to the atmospheric synths and blips that evoke a sense of exploration and dread!

Includes all 21 songs from the game. Available in MP3 and FLAC formats.
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack of Insect Adventure, composed by "Paradoxigent" and guest composer Joy Elvidge-Reeks. Immerse your human ears to the atmospheric synths and blips that evoke a sense of exploration and dread!

Includes all 21 songs from the game. Available in MP3 and FLAC formats.

Minimum:
  • Storage: 95 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 350 MB available space
